news.content:
ðŸ—ž ThreeFold in the News ðŸ—ž


For people to safely be in the metaverse â€“ it all starts by not letting the technology fall into the hands of centralized parties. The metaverse will need a decentralized Internet infrastructure â€“ and it needs to have collaborative ownership.


Check the article here via CMSWire.


The post discusses the metaverse and the future of work. Have you seen what weâ€™re working on with DigiCorp Labs? DigiThree is preparing enterprises for the decentralized metaverse.
news.excerpt: Co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer discusses why the metaverse will need a decentralized Internet infrastructure.
